content: ***this pattern combines both knitting and crocheting the body is crocheted half_double_crochet the trim is knit seed stitch nd stockinette stitch *** skill level easy size small medium large 1x 2x finished chest 38 40 42 45 52 in 96 5 101 5 106 5 114 5 132 cm finished length 19 19 20 20 21 in 48 5 48 5 51 51 53 5 cm #640 wool-ease thick & quick 6-8 balls or #135 hometown usa 8-11 balls crochet hook - size n-13 9 mm knitting needles - size 13 9 mm split ring stitch markers gauge 6½ half_double_crochet u s = 4 in 10 cm 5 row = 3 in 7 5 cm in half_double_crochet with crochet hook 7 sts + 10½ row = 3 in 7 5 cm in stockinette st k on rs p on ws with knitting needles construction schematics are provided available on lionbrand com in different yarns 60705a 1 640 wool-ease thick & quick corrections applied nov 16 2007 60705b 2 135 hometown usa 2009 1 http //www lionbrand com/patterns/60705a html 2 https //www lionbrand com/products/knitting-crochet-pattern-retro-swing-3
